text: The 2024 presidential campaign of Chase Oliver formally began on April 4, 2023, after the formation of an exploratory committee in December 2022. Chase Oliver officially received the presidential nomination of the Libertarian Party on May 26, 2024. Oliver is a libertarian political activist. He was the Libertarian nominee in the 2022 United States Senate election in Georgia and the 2020 Georgia's 5th congressional district special election. ==References== Oliver
title: Chase Oliver 2024 presidential campaign
